docs.snippet: After taking responsibility for playing Mark Sanchez late in Saturday’s preseason game, Jets Coach Rex Ryan did not want to answer questions Monday about Sanchez or Geno Smith....
docs.lead_paragraph: After taking responsibility for playing Mark Sanchez late in Saturday’s preseason game, Jets Coach Rex Ryan did not want to answer questions Monday about Sanchez or Geno Smith.
docs.abstract: New York Jets coach Rex Ryan refuses to address any topic remotely related to the team's quarterback situation; remains unclear whether Mark Sanchez's uncertain status means the team must prepare as if Geno Smith will start Week 1 against Tampa Bay Buccaneers; other Jets news and NFL developments noted.

headline.main: Ryan Refuses to Revisit Quarterback Situation
headline.print_headline: Ryan Refuses to Revisit Quarterback Situation

docs.snippet: St Gallen midfielder Kristian Nushi, who holds a Kosovan passport, will miss the Europa League playoff second leg at Spartak Moscow on Thursday because he was not granted a Russian visa....
